description: Made by Hama, assisted by Meteor w/ technical stuff
name: Part 7: Basic PvE Weapons rolls to look for

data.description: Having access to Explosive Payload along with another damage perk can be really strong, but you can also opt into Incan / Demo for Solar / Nade builds. For Barrels I like Fluted / Smallbore to get the other stats up to par along with Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Range.
data.name: Zaouli's Bane

data.description: Some explosive perk combinations here as you can pair Explosive Payload / Firefly along with another dmg option such as Frenzy / OFA / Focused Fury / Dragonfly. Personally I'd recommend Explosive Payload + Frenzy. For Barrels I'd go with Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tact for Mags. MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: Doom of Chelchis

data.description: Focused Fury along with another dmg perk sounds spicy, but you can also opt into Demo. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Handling / Stability.
data.name: Smite of Merain

data.description: The Origin perk enables several uses of Reservoir Burst so I'd highly recommend that, but Vorpal is another option. For 3rd column I'd go for Field Prep / Unrelenting. For Barrels I'd go for Arrowhead / Fluted and Liquid / Accel for Coils. MW: Handling / Reload.
data.name: Midha's Reckoning

data.description: For this machine gun I'd mostly want to opt into Killing Tally / Firefly, but Headstone works for Stasis builds. To pair with this I'd want Stats For all / Unrelenting. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: Qullim's Terminus

data.description: Not very good PvE options here, but you can opt into Lead From Gold / Firefly along with Vorpal if you want to try and make something work. For Barrels I'd go Arrowhead / Fluted and Tac / Alloy for Mags. MW: Handling / Reload.
data.name: Defiance of Yasmin

data.description: MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: Defiance of Yasmin

data.description: MW: Range.
data.name: Zaouli's Bane

data.description: Interesting potential for a ad clear sniper. Volt Shot should enable ad clear potential and that will be interesting to see how viable it will be in end game content. The only reason combinations that kinda works with it is Perp Motion / Auto-Loading though. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tact Mag for Mags. MW: Reload.
data.name: Mechabre

data.description: Triple Tap + Vorpal is the DPS combination here. Appended is the preferred Mag here as it'll allow you to hit 5 in the Mag with Backup Mag, but Extended Mag also works at the cost of your Reload. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted. MW: Handling.
data.name: Mechabre

data.description: The casual use rolls for this gun would be Clown / Auto-Loading combined with Vorpal. Though usually I'd opt into Volt Shot over Vorpal, this is also a fine choice if you'd rather want the single target dmg. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Tact / Appended for Mags. MW: Handling / Reload.
data.name: Mechabre

data.description: Jurassic is back with an improved 4th column. Basically any dmg perk works here, but Frenzy would be my go to. Incandescent can also work if you're running Solar sub classes. For 3rd column there's only Perp Motion / Subsistence to go for though. Arrowead / Fluted for Barrels and Flared / Richochet for Mags. MW: Handling.
data.name: Jurassic Green

data.description: You can get some very explosive ranges with this Auto Rifle with the correct Scopes. Rifle Scope SSF / ST are the recommended ones as they will enable these ranges. For Mags I'd go with Flared / Accurized. For Perks I'd want Ambitious Assassin / Subsistence along with Osmosis / Demo here. MW: Range / Reload.
data.name: Horror Story

data.description: MW: Stability.
data.name: Midha's Reckoning

data.description: MW: Range.
data.name: Smite of Merain

data.description: MW: Handling / Stability.
data.name: Doom of Chelchis

data.description: MW: Handling.
data.name: Jurassic Green

data.description: The Swarm doesn't have many PvE rolls but Outlaw / Surplus along with One For All is a fine combination. For Barrels I'd go for Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: THE SWARM

data.description: MW: Handling / Stability.
data.name: THE SWARM

data.description: Not many options here, but Outlaw / Surplus along with Timed Payload / Multikill  Clip are fine choices. For Sights I'd go for Steadyhand / Fastdraw and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Range.
data.name: Annual Skate

data.description: MW: Range.
data.name: Annual Skate

data.description: Machine guns are in a weird spot, but Clown / Auto Loading / Field Prep are solid perks to pair with One For All / Frenzy / Demo. For Barrels i'd go with Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Light for Mags. MW: Stability.
data.name: A Fine Memorial

data.description: Threat Detector works well with Sidearms and you can pair it with Frenzy / Swash / Demo here depending on what you want to use it for. For SIghts go for Quick / Control and Flared / Light for Mags. MW: Range.
data.name: Spoiler Alert

data.description: MW: Range.
data.name: Spoiler Alert

data.description: Perp Motion and Swash are the only PvE combinations I'd go for here along with Fluted / Cork as Barrels and Flared / Light as Mags. MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: Empirical Evidence

data.description: MW: Range.
data.name: Empirical Evidence

data.description: Field Prep / Threat Detector are nice shotgun perks and here you can pair it with Incan or 1-2 Punch if you want, you can also opt into Vorpal if you want to. For Barrels I'd go for Shroud / Cork and for Mags I recommend Assault / Tac. MW: Range.
data.name: Without Remorse

data.description: A bit lackluster on the 3rd column rolls, but you'll opt into Wellspring here and pair with Swash /  Incan. For Barrels I recommend Fluted / Arrowhead and Flared /  Tac for Mags. MW: Range.
data.name: Drang (Baroque)

data.description: MW: Range.
data.name: Drang (Baroque)

data.description: The Carbine returns with a spicy roll in Reconstruction + Target Lock, but you can also opt into FTTC if you haven't gotten a Recon roll yet. Other than that you can opt into Recon / Threat Detector + Frenzy / Swashbuckler. For Barrels I recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Seraph / Accurized for Mags. MW: Range / Stability.
data.name: Seventh Seraph Carbine

data.description: The Carbine returns with a spicy roll in Reconstruction + Target Lock, but you can also opt into FTTC if you haven't gotten a Recon roll yet. Other than that you can opt into Recon / Threat Detector + Frenzy / Swashbuckler. For Barrels I recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Seraph / Accurized for Mags. MW: Range / Stability.
data.name: Seventh Seraph Carbine

data.description: Avalanche really suffers on ammo reserves, but if you still want to use it I'd opt into Auto-Loading / Subsistence along with Adrenaline Junkie / Swash. I'm also interested in testing Target Lock, but it might not have the 3rd column perks to justify using it, but if I were gonna use it I'd go with Ambitious Assassin. For Barrels I'd go with Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Light for Mags. MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: Avalanche

data.description: While lacking in the PvE department, Tunnel Vision + Kill Clip is a potent PvP combination. Though Killing Wind, Encore and Desperado are also good options. For Barrels I recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags I'd go for High-Cal / Ricochet. MW: Range.
data.name: Stay Frosty

data.description: Slideshot + Res Burst is a really potent combination and the go to roll here, but you can also opt into Subsistence. For Barrels I'd go for Arrowhead / Fluted and for Coils, Liquid / Accelerated. MW: Stability.
data.name: Glacioclasm

data.description: Your general use for this sword will be for Cold Steel purposes, so you're aiming for the Relentless + Cold Steel combination. For Blade's you're looking for Jagged / Honed and for Guards you primarily want Swordmaster's, but as long as you avoid Heavy, you're generally fine.
data.name: Zephyr

data.description: This gun struggles hard on the Stability front and while you'd ideally have 20 stability on Aggressives, you'll have to rely on Stats For All or PerpMo to reach it here. Ideally you'll want the Stats for All + One For all combo, but you can also opt into Perp Motion and Frenzy / One For All. Subsistence can also be used. For Barrels I recommend Fluted / Smallbore and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Range / Stability.
data.name: Cold Front

data.description: Threat Detector + dmg perk is usually a good combination on Rapid Fire Sidearms and this one is no different, but you can also opt into Pugilist. You into options such as Swash / Kill Clip or Golden Tricorn. For Barrels I'd recommend Fluted / Cork and for Mags I'd go with Flared / Light. MW: Stability.
data.name: Fioritura-59

data.description: The spiritual successor to First In Last Out. You'll want Auto-Loading + Vorpal generally here and for DPS, but Voltshot can also be fun for general use. For Barrels I'd go with Arrowhead / Fluted and Tac / Appended for Mags. MW: Range / Handling.
data.name: Gunnora's Axe

data.description: Ikelos returns, but generally I'd use this as a DPS Sniper. In that case you'll want Fourth Times + Focused Fury. To go along with this you'll ideally want Arrowhead / Fluted for Barrels and Tac / Appended for Mags. MW: Handling.
data.name: IKELOS_SR_v1.0.3

data.description: Tunnel Vision + Kill Clip is a potent PvP combination and Repulsor Brace + Golden Tricorn is an interesting PvE option.
data.name: Veles-X

data.description: Slideshot + Res Burst is a really potent combination and the go to roll here, but you can also opt into Subsistence. For Barrels I'd go for Arrowhead / Fluted and for Coils, Liquid / Accelerated. MW: Stability.
data.name: Glacioclasm

data.description: This gun struggles hard on the Stability front and while you'd ideally have 20 stability on Aggressives, you'll have to rely on Stats For All or PerpMo to reach it here. Ideally you'll want the Stats for All + One For all combo, but you can also opt into Perp Motion and Frenzy / One For All. Subsistence can also be used. For Barrels I recommend Fluted / Smallbore and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Range / Stability.
data.name: Cold Front

data.description: This gun struggles hard on the Stability front and while you'd ideally have 20 stability on Aggressives, you'll have to rely on Stats For All or PerpMo to reach it here. Ideally you'll want the Stats for All + One For all combo, but you can also opt into Perp Motion and Frenzy / One For All. Subsistence can also be used. For Barrels I recommend Fluted / Smallbore and Flared / Tac for Mags. MW: Range / Stability.
data.name: Cold Front

data.description: Threat Detector + dmg perk is usually a good combination on Rapid Fire Sidearms and this one is no different, but you can also opt into Pugilist. You into options such as Swash / Kill Clip or Golden Tricorn. For Barrels I'd recommend Fluted / Cork and for Mags I'd go with Flared / Light. MW: Stability.
data.name: Fioritura-59

data.description: Avalanche really suffers on ammo reserves, but if you still want to use it I'd opt into Auto-Loading / Subsistence along with Adrenaline Junkie / Swash. I'm also interested in testing Target Lock, but it might not have the 3rd column perks to justify using it, but if I were gonna use it I'd go with Ambitious Assassin. For Barrels I'd go with Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Light for Mags. MW: Stability / Handling.
data.name: Avalanche
